document_data.name: Mosque of the Revered
document_data.mainbody: The '''Mosque of the Revered''' was a temple in [[Dihliz]] dedicated to the worship of [[Kor]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{cite book/Ruined Kingdoms/Campaign Guide|20}}
document_data.Description: The facade of the mosque was slightly worn and faded, despite its prestigious location near the [[Ivory Palace]].
document_data.Activities: In [[1367 DR]]{{AQ-time}} the mosque was supported almost entirely by donations from visitors from the [[Cities of the Pantheon]]. Kor did not have a strong following in Dihliz when compared to [[Selan]], meaning the mosque often fell into financial hardship. Because of this, priests of Kor would bestow their spells on anyone making a sizable donation without hesitation or questioning their motives.
